Posted By: Jokergius (12/25/2009 11:50:34 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: It's not a very good card, even for a lifegain deck. There's no card advantage, board advantage, and it only combos with a few select cards (Sanguine Bond, Cradle of Vitality, Felidar Sovereign). I've made a semi competitive lifegain deck (I say semi competitive as while it's capable of winning, it's a lot slower than most of the normal aggro decks out), and this card won't get a slot in either the main board or the side board - 10 health on turn 5 just isn't enough; that's only 1 to 2 extra swings from the opponent. If you want a 5 drop that gives you health, go with Baneslayer Angel. =)
posts.html:
It's not a very good card, even for a lifegain deck. There's no card advantage, board advantage, and it only combos with a few select cards (Sanguine Bond, Cradle of Vitality, Felidar Sovereign). I've made a semi competitive lifegain deck (I say semi competitive as while it's capable of winning, it's a lot slower than most of the normal aggro decks out), and this card won't get a slot in either the main board or the side board - 10 health on turn 5 just isn't enough; that's only 1 to 2 extra swings from the opponent. If you want a 5 drop that gives you health, go with Baneslayer Angel. =)
